hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Hover Boots#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Tree Compass#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Bug Bottle# and #a Heart Container#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Shield# and #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #stable#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Deku Nut Capacity#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Hover Boots#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Bongo Bongo really hates the cold.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Fire Arrows#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that arbitrary code execution leads to the credits sequence.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #a Wallet#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Fire Arrows#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Tree Compass#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Small Key#.
